div.span:
Fetch the inputs from
request.form: name,
email, username,
password1, password2

Use the function verifyField
to check each input

If any of these return
an error, prompt the
user to try again

Else, continue to the next
phase of validation

Check email to make sure
it is formatted correctly

Check that password1 doesn't
equal password2

Using the SQL query
"SELECT user_id FROM User
WHERE user_id=username"
to see whether any other users
with this username exist

If any of these return
an error, prompt the
user to try again
